ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتْ عَلَيْهِمْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those against whom the words of your Lord are justly carried out will never have iman -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily those against whom the word of your Lord is pronounced will never believe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely those against whom the word of your Lord has been fulfilled will not believed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Even though all kinds of miracles will be shown to them) those about whom the word of your Lord has been ordained, will not have faith
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed those for whom the Word of your Lord has proved true, will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, those, against whom the Word of your Lord has been justified, will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely those against whom the word of your Lord has proved true will not believe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those against whom thy Lord's word is realized will not believe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! those for whom the word of thy Lord (concerning sinners) hath effect will not believe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those against whom your Lord's word has been confirmed will never believe;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily those on whom the word of thy Lord hath been justified shall not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed those against whom your Lord’s judgement has become due will not have faith,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those against whom the word of thy Lord hath been verified would not believe-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly! Those, against whom the Word (Wrath) of your Lord has been justified, will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those against whom the Word of your Lord will be realized will not believe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those against whom your Lord’s Word is justified will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, those upon whom the word of your Lord has come into effect will not believe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:96] Truly those against whom your Lord’s Word, of chastisement, is justified, [against whom] it is due, will not believe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! those for whom the word of your Lord) that they will be punished (hath effect) has been enjoined (will not believe) as it is in Allah's foreknowledge,
